dt: {bc}of, relating to, or having the characteristics of a {a_link|utopia}
{bc}having impossibly ideal conditions especially of social organization
{bc}proposing or advocating impractically ideal social and political schemes

dt.t: recognised the {wi}utopian{/wi} nature of his hopes

dt: {bc}believing in, advocating, or having the characteristics of utopian socialism

shortdef: of, relating to, or having the characteristics of a utopia; especially : having impossibly ideal conditions especially of social organization
proposing or advocating impractically ideal social and political schemes

dt: {bc}one who believes in the perfectibility of human society
{bc}one who proposes or advocates utopian schemes

shortdef: one who believes in the perfectibility of human society
one who proposes or advocates utopian schemes

dt: {bc}socialism based on a belief that social ownership of the means of production can be achieved by voluntary and peaceful surrender of their holdings by propertied groups

shortdef: socialism based on a belief that social ownership of the means of production can be achieved by voluntary and peaceful surrender of their holdings by propertied groups
